concept.title: Payroll Processing Results Management
concept.shortdesc: Manage payroll processing results from the following pages either the Create Instant Checks page or the View/Change Payroll results page.

ul.li: Create instant checks from either the Create Instant Checks page or the View/Change Payroll Results page.
View or change payroll processing results from the View/Change Payroll Results page.

link.linktext: Add or Change Employee Pay Check Details
